name: Tangosol
overview: Tangosol provides reliable data grid solutions for mission-critical enterprise applications. Its products include Tangosol Coherence, which enables in-memory data management for clustered J2EE applications and application servers; Tangosol Coherence Data Grid for Spring that provides spring developers with a resource to manage and process application data; and Coherence for .NET, a data grid solution, built with .NET technologies to provide data management solution for .NET applications. The company offers solutions, such as CTO’s and CIO’s, software architects, developers, performance, reliability, and scalability. It serves financial, manufacturing, telecommunications, and technology enterprises. Tangosol, Inc. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Somerville, Massachusetts.

acquisition.source_description: Oracle Acquires Tangosol, adds Parallel Transaction Processing Support
